name: Fire Hero 2 - Cube Rouge
description:
Do you love games with balls and number bricks? Try Fire Hero 2!
In this game you need to break wall. Use the ball to shoot and reduce the number on the brick to break the brick block.
Become the best bricks breaker crusher and defeat the bosses!



Game Features
- New version with new challenges
- One-handed operation
- Different cool boosters
- Endless gameplay
- Greatly Addictive



Play and enjoy flying Fire Hero2!
